鮥字的基本解释

鮥
luò
一种小鱼。

鮥
gé
鳄鱼。

鮥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［luò］
［《廣韻》盧各切，入鐸，來。］
鮛鲔，较小的鲟类鱼。

鮥字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮥； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1469第14
【唐韻】盧各切【集韻】歷各切，?音洛。【說文】叔鮪也。【爾雅·釋魚】鮥，鮛鮪。【註】今宜都郡自京門以上，江中通出鱏鱣之魚。有一魚狀似鱣而小，建平人呼鮥子。【疏】鮪，一名鮥，肉色白，味不如鱣也。互詳鮪字註。又【集韻】戸賄切，音塊。又剛鶴切，音各。義?同。又【集韻】各頟切，音格。?或作鮥。詳?字註。

鮥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鮥字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
鮥
luò
A small fish.
鮥
gé
crocodile.
鮥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［luò］
["Guangyun" Lu Geqie, enter the priest, come. ]
The tuna, a smaller sturgeon.
鮥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮥; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1469-14
[Tang Yun] Lu Geqie [Jiyun] Li Geqie,? Yinluo. [Said the text] Uncle Tuna also. 【Erya·Shiyu】鮥，鮛鮛. [Note] Today's Yidu County is above the gate of Jingmen, and the fish of bonito is found in the middle of the river. There is a fish that looks like a bonito but is small, and the people of Jianping call the fish. 【Sparse】Tuna, a glutinous fish, white flesh, not as good as bonito. Mutual detailed notes on the word Tuna. Also 【Ji Yun】to bribe and cut, sound block. Ganghe cut again, each sound. Righteous? Same. Also 【Jiyun】Each 頟切, phonetic pattern. ? Or as a joke. Detailed? Note.
